full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED ME YI SPU GRI'I BDAG MDUN SRUNG ZLOG GI 'DON 'GRIGS GAB SPRAD NAS BLTAS CHOG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B ZHES PA 'DI NYID STOBS CHEN GLANG GI LO CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO NAG PO'I PHYOGS KYI TSES BCU LA BRTZAMS TE PHYIS DE NYID TSANG BA AA R'A GAS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,AE MA HO, RDO RJE @018A *, ,'JIGS BYED ME YI SPU GRI YI, ,SRUNG ZLOG GZHUNG DANG LAS BYANG SGRUB THABS DANG, ,LAS SBYOR BCAS PA'I GAB 'KHRUGS SBAS PA RNAMS, ,SNGAGS CHUNG RMONGS PA PHAL GYIS RTOGS DKA' BAS, ,SNYIGS DUS 'GRO LA PHAN PA'I SEMS KYIS BKOD, ,'ON KYANG GTER CHOS SHIN TU GNYAN PA DANG, ,BDAG 'DRA SO SKYE DBANG GIS NONGS PA RNAMS, ,BLA MA YI DAM CHOS SKYONG DAM CAN DANG, ,GTER SRUNG BCAS LA 'GYOD PA'I SEMS KYIS BSHAGS, , 'DI PHYIR SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR THUGS RJES ZUNG, ,'DI BRIS RNAM DKAR DGE BA GANG MCHIS DES, ,BDAG DANG BDAG GI RJES SU 'JUG RNAMS DANG, ,'DI BRIS MTHONG THOS DRAN REG 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,SKYE BA KUN TU 'JAM DBYANGS RJES BZUNG ZHIG ,MGON PO KUN GZIGS ZHABS DRUNG SKYE BAR SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,
